scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:shared
scripts.all: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run mobile"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=mobile && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=shared && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=mobile && npm install --workspace=backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=shared && npm run clean --workspace=frontend && npm run clean --workspace=mobile && npm run clean --workspace=backend
